Control Name: 9.2.6 Removal or adjustment of access rights
Control Statement: The access rights of all employees, contractors and third party users to information and information processing facilities shall be removed upon termination of their employment, contract or agreement, or adjusted upon change

control_attributes.Control_Objective: 9.2.6 Removal or adjustment of access rights
